paper_abstract: This paper presents a new method to forecast TAIEX based on a high-order type 2 fuzzy time series. Extra observations are used to improve forecasting performance. Extra observations are modeled as type 2 fuzzy sets and fourth-order fuzzy time series. Our proposed model outperforms previous studies. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Forecasting TAIEX using improved type 2 fuzzy time series
